pullrequest.title: Polaris: raise steering wheel, add collision shapes for roll cage and handles

content.raw:
The model is currently missing a lot of the entrance collision detail, i.e. the floor is not as wide as in the visual model and all the slopy stuff on the side of the entrance and the center of the vehicle is missing:

* http://i.imgur.com/MFnzNSY.jpg
* http://i.imgur.com/zKtkcuk.png
* http://i.imgur.com/uYiiXPf.jpg

I'm not really shouting for a change (as it gives more room to move with the slopy stuff missing), I just mainly want to know whether collision models for these sections will still be added or whether the model will stay the way it is in these areas.
content.html:
The model is currently missing a lot of the entrance collision detail, i.e. the floor is not as wide as in the visual model and all the slopy stuff on the side of the entrance and the center of the vehicle is missing:

  • http://i.imgur.com/MFnzNSY.jpg
  • http://i.imgur.com/zKtkcuk.png
  • http://i.imgur.com/uYiiXPf.jpg

I'm not really shouting for a change (as it gives more room to move with the slopy stuff missing), I just mainly want to know whether collision models for these sections will still be added or whether the model will stay the way it is in these areas.
